entry.name: MAV_TYPE_ASV_RSGA
entry.description: Identifies the Radio Signal Generator and Analyzer (RSGA) payload in the HEARTBEAT message

enum.name: ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE
enum.description: Defines RSGA modes mapped to the custom_mode[0–7] bit field of the HEARTBEAT message. Maximum 255 values

enum.name: ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_SUB_MODE
enum.description: A mapping of RSGA special sub modes for custom_mode[8-15] bits field of heartbeat.[!THIS_IS_ENUM_FLAG!]

enum.name: ASV_RSGA_REQUEST_ACK
enum.description: ACK / NACK / ERROR values as a result of ASV_RSGA_*_REQUEST commands

enum.name: ASV_RSGA_DATA_FLAGS
enum.description: Common status flags for all ASV_RSGA_RTT_* data.[!THIS_IS_ENUM_FLAG!]

enum.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_GNSS_FLAGS
enum.description: Common status flags for all ASV_RSGA_RTT_GNSS message.[!THIS_IS_ENUM_FLAG!]

entry.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_GNSS_FLAGS_ON_THE_GROUND
entry.description: This flag is set when the vehicle is known to be on the ground

enum.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_ADSB_MSG_UF
enum.description: Mode S interrogation or uplink formats.[!THIS_IS_ENUM_FLAG!]

enum.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_ADSB_MSG_DF
enum.description: Mode S reply or downlink formats.[!THIS_IS_ENUM_FLAG!]

enum.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_CHART_UNIT_TYPE
enum.description: Chart unit type for RF signal visualization

entry.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_CHART_DATA_FORMAT_RANGE_FLOAT_8BIT
entry.description: Write a value as a fraction between a given minimum and maximum. Uses 8 bits so we have '256' steps between min and max.

entry.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_CHART_DATA_FORMAT_RANGE_FLOAT_16BIT
entry.description: Write a value as a fraction between a given minimum and maximum. Uses 16 bits so we have '65535' steps between min and max.

entry.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_CHART_DATA_FORMAT_FLOAT
entry.description: Write a value as a float. Uses 32 bits.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASV_RSGA_START_RECORD
entry.description: Start data recording with a unique name (maximum 28 characters). Can be used in mission protocol for RSGA payloads

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASV_RSGA_STOP_RECORD
entry.description: Stop recording data. Can be used in the mission protocol for RSGA payloads

message.name: ASV_RSGA_COMPATIBILITY_REQUEST
message.description: Requests device COMPATIBILITY. Returns ASV_RSGA_COMPATIBILITY_RESPONSE. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Specifies a unique number for this request. This allows the response packet to be identified

message.name: ASV_RSGA_COMPATIBILITY_RESPONSE
message.description: Responds to the ASV_RSGA_COMPATIBILITY_REQUEST. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Specifies the unique number of the original request. This allows the response to be matched to the correct request
Supported modes. Each bit index represents an ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE value (256 bits). First (IDLE) bit always true

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_CHART
message.description: Common chart data. Can be transmitted for all supported modes (e.g. spectrum for LLZ\GP\VOR or pulse shape for DME) [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_GNSS
message.description: Global position from GNSS receiver. Can be transmitted for all supported modes. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: GNSS reference station ID (used when GNSS is received from multiple sources)
Antenna altitude above/below mean sea level (geoid)

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_SPECTRUM
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_SPECTRUM mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_TX_LLZ
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_TX_LLZ mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_TX_GP
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_TX_GP mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_TX_VOR
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_TX_VOR mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_TX_MARKER
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_TX_MARKER mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_DME_REP
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_DME_REP mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Percent of total TX gain level (0.0 - 1.0)
Signal overflow indicator (≤0.2 — too weak, ≥0.8 — too strong).
Percent of total RX gain level (0.0 - 1.0)
Pulse shape: rise time (3.5 μs, ±0.5 μs)
Pulse shape: amplitude (between 95% rise/fall amplitudes, ≥95% of maximum amplitude)
Pulse spacing (X channel 12 ±0.25 us, Y channel: 30 ±0.25 us)

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_TX_GBAS
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_TX_GBAS mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_ADSB_REQ
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_ADSB_REQ mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_TX_GNSS
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_TX_GNSS mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_DME_REQ
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_DME_REQ mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Signal overflow indicator (≤0.2 — too low, ≥0.8 — too high)
Percent of total RX gain level (0.0 - 1.0)
Percent of total TX gain level (0.0 - 1.0)
Pulse shape: rise time (3.5 μs, ±0.5 μs)
Pulse shape: amplitude (between 95% rise/fall amplitudes, ≥95% of maximum amplitude)
Pulse spacing (X channel 12 ±0.25 us, Y channel: 30 ±0.25 us)
Measured number of all replies, that was recognised as beacon HIP

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_RX_LLZ
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_RX_LLZ mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Signal overflow indicator (≤0.2 — too low, ≥0.8 — too high)
Percent of total RX gain level (0.0 - 1.0)
Total frequency offset of signal 90 Hz
Total frequency offset of signal 150 Hz
Phase difference 90 Hz low and high freq channel
Phase difference 150 Hz low and high freq channel
Input power of low freq channel
Carrier frequency offset of low freq channel
Aplitude modulation of 90Hz of low freq channel
Frequency offset of signal 90 Hz of low freq channel
Aplitude modulation of 150Hz of low freq channel
Frequency offset of signal 150 Hz of low freq channel
Input power of high freq channel
Carrier frequency offset of high freq channel
Aplitude modulation of 90Hz of high freq channel
Frequency offset of signal 90 Hz of high freq channel
Aplitude modulation of 150Hz of high freq channel
Frequency offset of signal 150 Hz of high freq channel
Current amplitude modulation of Code ID
Min amplitude modulation of Code ID
Max amplitude modulation of Code ID

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_RX_GP
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_RX_GP mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Signal overflow indicator (≤0.2 — too low, ≥0.8 — too high)
Percent of total RX gain level (0.0 - 1.0)
Input power of low freq channel
Carrier frequency offset of low freq channel
Aplitude modulation of 90Hz of low freq channel
Frequency offset of signal 90 Hz of low freq channel
Aplitude modulation of 150Hz of low freq channel
Frequency offset of signal 150 Hz of low freq channel
Input power of high freq channel
Carrier frequency offset of high freq channel
Aplitude modulation of 90Hz of high freq channel
Frequency offset of signal 90 Hz of high freq channel
Aplitude modulation of 150Hz of high freq channel
Frequency offset of signal 150 Hz of high freq channel
Total frequency offset of signal 90 Hz
Total frequency offset of signal 150 Hz
Phase difference 90 Hz low and high freq channel
Phase difference 150 Hz low and high freq channel

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_RX_VOR
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_RX_VOR mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Signal overflow indicator (≤0.2 — too low, ≥0.8 — too high)
Percent of total RX gain level (0.0 - 1.0)
Total frequency offset of signal 30 Hz
Total frequency offset of signal 9960 Hz
Current amplitude modulation of Code ID
Min amplitude modulation of Code ID
Max amplitude modulation of Code ID

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_RX_MARKER
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_RX_MARKER mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Signal overflow indicator (≤0.2 — too low, ≥0.8 — too high)
Percent of total RX gain level (0.0 - 1.0)
Current AM modulation depth of the 400 Hz component
Max AM modulation depth of the 400 Hz component
Min AM modulation depth of the 400 Hz component
AM modulation depth of the 1300 Hz component
Max AM modulation depth of the 1300 Hz component
Min AM modulation depth of the 1300 Hz component
AM modulation depth of the 3000 Hz component
Max AM modulation depth of the 3000 Hz component
Min AM modulation depth of the 3000 Hz component

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_RX_GBAS
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_RX_GBAS mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_ADSB_REP
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_ADSB_REP mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Percent of total TX gain level (0.0 - 1.0)
Signal overflow indicator (≤0.2 — too weak, ≥0.8 — too strong)
Percent of total RX gain level (0.0 - 1.0)
GNSS reference station ID (used when GNSS is received from multiple sources)
Vehicle identifier (8 characters, valid characters are A-Z, 0-9, " " only)
UF incremental counters for every 25 message
DF incremental counters for every 25 message

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_RX_GNSS
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_RX_GNSS mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]

message.name: ASV_RSGA_RTT_RDF
message.description: Real time telemetry (RTT) for ASV_RSGA_CUSTOM_MODE_RDF mode. [!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
